src:
See Photos of the SpeedKore Dodge Charger
05 Nov 2019, 20:33 by Car and Driver











Because a 1525-hp twin-turbo, all-wheel-drive Dodge Charger is just what the world needs, and we spotted it at SEMA.

From Car and Driver
